channel.title: Example Project Bootcamp on YCP Radio Telescope Knowledge Base

item.title: Backend Bootcamp
item.description: Backend Bootcamp The purpose of this section is to help you get hands on with the structure and work-flow of the architecture. If you plan on working on the backend, it is highly recommended to work through the bootcamp section to get a good understanding of what the backend architecture will look like, how to use Kotlin efficienty, and how all of the different pieces of the architecture fit with each other.
